data.message: I of course have the Facebook app before I download it it's like 23 megabytes and after a few days when I check the memory on my phone Facebook takes up a total memory of 160 megabytes how and why does the memory balloon up like 130 megabytes more then when I first downloaded it that's bull it is wrong

replies.message: Hi Matthew. Would you mind reporting your issue with memory use through the app so that our team can look into it? Our Help Center has instructions on how to report: http://on.fb.me/1n5kJPF Thanks! -Ryan
